org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class Telemedicine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.helpers.Telemedicine

  • public class Telemedicine
extends java.lang.Object
    A place for helpers related to telemedicine.

    • Field Detail

      • CURRENT_CHANCE

        public static final double CURRENT_CHANCE
        Odds of an encounter being virtual, a.k.a. telemedicine are taken from the McKinsey report: https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare-systems-and-services/our-insights/telehealth-a-quarter-trillion-dollar-post-covid-19-reality

        The report claims that since April 2020, telemedicine accounted for 13 - 17% of visits. 15% was used here for simplicity. It also claims that the current levels of telemedicine are 38 times the prepandemic baseline. That would make the prepandemic baseline 0.4%

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PREPANDEMIC_CHANCE

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • shouldEncounterBeVirtual

        public static boolean shouldEncounterBeVirtual(Person person,
                                               long time)
        Determines whether an encounter should be telemedicine, with different chances before and after the start of the COVID-19 pandemic.
        Parameters:
        person - source of randomness
        time - current time in the simulation
        Returns:
        true if the encounter should be virtual
